page.title: 05Biography. Life Styles.
page.content: ankle socks, white cardigan and white shoes. My favourite pop groups are Sister Sledge and Wham.{ {A day in the life of Andrew Melleney. {At Home on Saturday.} On Saturday I wake up at about 5.00 am and read until 6.15 am and then I watch TV-AM. After that has finished I play on my Spectrum computer using my T.V. as a monitor. The game that I normally play is Atic Atac. For my Spectrum computer I have a printer and a joystick and two joystick interfaces. I play on the computer until about 1.00 pm. For lunch I normally have bacon and chips. In the afternoon I sometimes play with my radio controlled car, then at 5.50 pm I have tea which is usually a slice of toast. Then I watch television until about 10 or 11 o'clock. On Saturday I wear a pair of jeans, a sweat shirt
